MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Whitchurch Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.12PM on 13th December 2020.
